Your feedback helps us improve. Thank you. Upload Screenshot Gargi Sanket Prabhu K K Birla Goa Computer Science & Information Systems Assistant Professor D-159, CS & IS Department BITS Pilani K. K. Birla Goa Campus NH 17B, Bypass, Road, Zuarinagar, Sancoale, Goa 403726 gargia@goa.bits-pilani.ac.in 0832-2580822 https://www.linkedin.com/in/gargi-alavani-b4115b45/?originalSubdomain=in About the Faculty Gargi Alavani Prabhu completed her B.E. and M.Tech from Goa University. She works as a Visiting Assistant Professor in the Department of CS & IS, BITS Pilani, K K Birla Goa Campus, India. She completed her Ph.D. under Prof. Santonu Sarkar and Prof. Neena Goveas on “Prediction of Performance and Power Consumption of GPGPU Applications “ from BITS Pilani. Her research interests are Visual Computing, High-Performance Computing, and Machine Learning.  She has publications in reputable journals/conferences. Loading...
